All Known Implementing Classes:

  • Method Details

    • useBy

      void useBy(Creature creature)
      Allows a creature to use Device or Sport Equipment.
      Parameters:
      creature - The creature using the Usable.

    • repair

      void repair(Creature creature)
      Repairs the Usable by a creature.
      Parameters:
      creature - The creature repairing the Usable.

    • breakUsable

      void breakUsable()
      Breaks the Usable. Makes a record in Logger.

    • isBroken

      boolean isBroken()
      Checks if the Usable is currently broken.
      Returns:
      True if the Usable is broken, false otherwise.

    • updateLifespan

      void updateLifespan(int i)
      Updates the lifespan of the usable.
      Parameters:
      i - Adds to current lifespan of the Usable (usually negative number)
